name: venom-drench
effect: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.
